Package de.gnwi.mfsim.model.graphics.particle

Class GraphicalParticlePositionInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.mfsim.model.graphics.particle.GraphicalParticlePositionInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueItemUpdateNotifierInterface
    public class GraphicalParticlePositionInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements ValueItemUpdateNotifierInterface
    Graphical particle positions with additional information
    Author:
    Achim Zielesny

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphicalParticlePositionInfo

        public GraphicalParticlePositionInfo​(GraphicalParticleInfo aGraphicalParticleInfo,
                                     GraphicalParticlePosition[] anInitialGraphicalParticlePositions,
                                     BoxSizeInfo aBoxSizeInfo,
                                     double aLengthConversionFactor,
                                     int aMinMoleculeIndex,
                                     int aMaxMoleculeIndex)
        Constructor. NOTE: NO checks performed.
        Parameters:
        aGraphicalParticleInfo - GraphicalParticleInfo instance
        anInitialGraphicalParticlePositions - Initial graphical particle positions
        aBoxSizeInfo - Box size info
        aLengthConversionFactor - Factor that converts DPD length to physical length (Angstrom since particle volumes are in Angstrom^3)
        aMinMoleculeIndex - Minimum molecule index (-1 means NOT defined)
        aMaxMoleculeIndex - Maximum molecule index (-1 means NOT defined)

      • setCurrentGraphicalParticlePositions

        public void setCurrentGraphicalParticlePositions​(boolean anIsZoomStatistics)
        Sets this.currentGraphicalParticlePositionArrayList from this.initialGraphicalParticlePositions: Performs exclusions and rotations according to settings. NOTE: The rotation angles of Preferences are used.
        Parameters:
        anIsZoomStatistics - True: Zoom statistics are calculated if possible, false: Otherwise

      • setCurrentGraphicalParticlePositions

        public void setCurrentGraphicalParticlePositions​(double aRotationAroundXaxisAngle,
                                                 double aRotationAroundYaxisAngle,
                                                 double aRotationAroundZaxisAngle,
                                                 double aParticleShiftX,
                                                 double aParticleShiftY,
                                                 double aParticleShiftZ)
        Sets this.currentGraphicalParticlePositionArrayList from this.initialGraphicalParticlePositions: Performs exclusions and rotations according to settings. NOTE: The specified rotation angles are used. NOTE: Zoom statistics are NOT calculated.
        Parameters:
        aRotationAroundXaxisAngle - Angle for rotation around x axis in degree
        aRotationAroundYaxisAngle - Angle for rotation around y axis in degree
        aRotationAroundZaxisAngle - Angle for rotation around z axis in degree
        aParticleShiftX - Particle shift in percent of simulation box length along x-axis
        aParticleShiftY - Particle shift in percent of simulation box length along y-axis
        aParticleShiftZ - Particle shift in percent of simulation box length along z-axis

      • setCurrentGraphicalParticlePositions

        public void setCurrentGraphicalParticlePositions​(double aRotationAroundXaxisAngle,
                                                 double aRotationAroundYaxisAngle,
                                                 double aRotationAroundZaxisAngle,
                                                 double aParticleShiftX,
                                                 double aParticleShiftY,
                                                 double aParticleShiftZ,
                                                 boolean anIsZoomStatistics)
        Sets this.currentGraphicalParticlePositionArrayList from this.initialGraphicalParticlePositions: Performs exclusions and rotations according to settings. NOTE: The specified rotation angles are used.
        Parameters:
        aRotationAroundXaxisAngle - Angle for rotation around x axis in degree
        aRotationAroundYaxisAngle - Angle for rotation around y axis in degree
        aRotationAroundZaxisAngle - Angle for rotation around z axis in degree
        aParticleShiftX - Particle shift in percent of simulation box length along x-axis
        aParticleShiftY - Particle shift in percent of simulation box length along y-axis
        aParticleShiftZ - Particle shift in percent of simulation box length along z-axis
        anIsZoomStatistics - True: Zoom statistics are calculated if possible, false: Otherwise
